whatToExpect: Submit your training goals and availability on Homezy. You’ll receive offers from certified martial arts instructors. Compare backgrounds, styles, and rates to choose a trainer that fits your personal fitness or combat sport ambitions.

faqs.question: Do I need prior experience to start MMA?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is required. Instructors on Homezy work with all levels and will design sessions that suit your pace and abilities.

faqs.question: Are kids' classes available?
faqs.answer: Yes, many instructors offer specialized MMA programs for kids focused on discipline, coordination, and self-defense.
